question: General feeling of wellbeing: Have you felt ill or unwell?
Have you felt weak?
Have you had a dry mouth?
Have you had headaches?
Have you had hot flushes?
Have you had trouble sleeping?
Have food and drink tasted different than usual?
Have you lacked appetite?
Have you felt nauseated?
Have you vomited?
Have you been constipated?
Have you had diarrhea?
Did you have a pain/itch/irritation in the body?
Was the pain/itch/irritation in your breast or vagina?
Have you had a swollen arm or hand?
Have you had problems raising your arm or moving it sideways?
Have you had tingling hands or feet?
Do you have pain in your joints?
Have you had any pain in your arm or shoulder?
Was the pain/itch/irritation in your breast?
Has the area of your affected breast been swollen?
Has the area of your affected breast been oversensitive?
Have you had skin problems on or in the area of your affected breast (e.g. itchy
Did you have vaginal pain or discomfort with intercourse?
Did you have vaginal dryness?
Did you have vaginal itching/irritation?
Did you have vaginal discharge?
Did you have vaginal bleeding or spotting?
Have you had any problems in everyday physical activities?
Do you have any trouble doing strenuous activities like carrying a heavy shoppping bag or a suitcase?
Do you need to stay in bed or a chair during the day?
Do you have any trouble taking a short walk outside of the house?
Do you have any trouble taking a long walk?
Do you need help with eating
column4: washing yourself or using the toilet?

question: Has your physical condition or medical treatment interfered with your social activities?
Has your physical condition or medical treatment interfered with your family life?
Did you have any problems in activities such as sports?
Were you limited in doing either your work or other daily activities?
Were you limited in pursuing your hobbies or other leisure time activities?
Were you short of breath?
Have you had pain?
Did you need to rest?
Did you have mental related problems/frustrations?
Did you worry?
Have you had difficulty in concentration on things
column3: like reading a newspaper or watching television?

question: Did you feel tense?
Have you had difficulty remembering things?
Have you worried about your health in the future?
Did you feel depressed?
Did you feel irritable?
Has your physical condition or medical treatment caused you financial difficulties?
Have you been dissatisfied with your body?
Have you lost any hair?
Have you been upset by the loss of your hair?
Have you felt less feminine as a result of your disease or treatment?
Have you felt physically less attractive as a result of your disease or treatment?
Have you had problems looking at yourself naked?
Have you been interested in sex?
Have you been sexually active (with or without intercourse)?
Has sex been enjoyable to you?
